The video in question was shared on Face: 2019, and has been viewed more than 900,000 times and shared more than 45,000 times.
The video shows a man speaking in Hindi: where his comments translate to English as a threat to convert to Islam if justice is not served for Tabrez Ansari's death.
The claim of Hindus threatening to accep: s death is false, as the video has been circulating online since 2017 and is related to a teachers' protest in Uttar Pradesh.
The YouTube video: which is the original source of the video in the misleading posts, is titled "Contractual teachers gave a threat of religion conversion to Yogi, Shikshamitra case" and relates to teacher protests in Lalitpur, Uttar Pradesh.
